dataList.name: Bursting Strike, Breathing Siphon
dataList.desc: On Kill with this unit's Attack Skill, gain [Breath] equal to [Burst] on the target (max 5)

dataList.name: Ba Jiao Banana Bolus
dataList.desc:
Inflict +1 more [Burst] Potency or [Burst] Count (2 times per turn)
If this unit's Offense Level is higher than the target's, Clash Power +1

dataList.name: Jin Gang Bolus
dataList.desc: Clash Lose: gain 3 [DefenseUp] (2 times per turn)
